titles.title: End College CCP Act
To limit Federal funding for institutions of higher education that have partnerships with the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
End College CCP Act
End College Chinese Communist Partnerships Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
End College Chinese Communist Partnerships Act or the End College CCP Act
This bill generally prohibits an institution of higher education (IHE) from receiving federal funds if the IHE has a contractual partnership with the Chinese government or an entity that is organized under the laws of China. An IHE may regain eligibility for federal funds by disclosing and terminating those contractual partnerships.
